properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 9:09AM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Mississippi...

Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County
Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee
* until Saturday evening.
* At  8:30 AM Wednesday the stage was 19.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage by 6 AM Thursday
and will continue to rise to near 23.8 feet early by Friday morning.
* Impact...At 23.0 feet...Flooding in low areas on the left bank is
occurring.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 48 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Saturday evening
